reviewText: George Nader was an amazingly charismatic lead actor. All the usual fight and chase scenes remarkable realistic

One can tell that this is a foreign/German movie (from the books written by "Jerry Cotton"), because: 1. it doesn't show any interesting adventurous New York street scenes like American movies do (only the Manhattan skyline at night at the beginning, and a from-above panoramic view at the end), and 2. the plot is not as rich/interesting as in American equivalents.
